question: Hi there,My daughter had a lethargic/almost unresponsive period two days ago, in which we took her in to the doc right away.  After doing lots of blood work, her blood sugars were 334.  We immediately were admitted to the hospital where her blood sugars then were 60.  The docs were baffled with this low number.  Within a few hours it was back up to 225, with glucose  and ketos found in her urine.  They kept her overnight and monitored her levels, which were consistentley in the 130's.  We were able to come home yesterday and continue to monitor her blood suagrs at home which are still in the upper 130's.  We do have an appt. with a ped. endo. but just wondering what could be going on.  Could this be very early onset of Type 1 diabetes?Thank you!
title: possible diabetes in 4 year old
